overview.randingCardTitle: You can see paintings in Paintee.
overview.randingCardContents:
Paintee is full of paintings,
where you can be an artist,
and it is easy to have those as well.
overview.randingCardTitle2: You can get any painting you want.
overview.randingCardContents2:
You can get all paintings in Paintee as a postcard form.
Just click 'Post it' button.
overview.randingCardTitle3: $2 USD is all you have to pay.
overview.randingCardContents3:
No additional shipping fee is required.
You can send anywhere with $2 USD only.
overview.randingCardTitle4: Your painting will become a postcard.
overview.randingCardContents4:
It will be a real postcard.
Only enough size of image is needed

post.randingCardContents1:
You can send the postcard to yourself,
or it can be other person.
Please enter the exact address and doublecheck it.
post.randingCardContents2: Your message will be delivered with the painting.
post.randingCardTitle3: Please wait, it takes a while
post.randingCardContents3: All purchased postcards will be delivered through regular mail.
post.randingCardTitle4: Your support will be a lot to the artists.
post.randingCardContents4: Part of your $2 USD support will be contributed to the artists for the sponsorship.

upload.randingCardTitle1: Your image will become a postcard.
upload.randingCardContents1:
It will truly be a postcard,
which delivers a message to the people in the world
with your artwork printed.
upload.randingCardTitle2: You can upload only one image for now.
upload.randingCardContents2:
Your image needs to be sold for five times
in order to upload one more image.
If your image gets many likes,
you can upload more images
upload.randingCardTitle3: Enough size of image is needed.
upload.randingCardContents3:
Enough size of image is needed to make a real postcard.
Please prepare an image larger than 1080 x 1920 pixel.
upload.randingCardTitle4: 25% of selling price will be paid back to you.
upload.randingCardContents4:
You can get $0.5 USD of rewards per one postcard sold.
Collect your reward to get the actual money back.

follow.loginexplain: Images of the artist you are following.
follow.notloginexplain:
Welcome.
Send or receive a beautiful image as a postcard.

popular.explain: This is the most popular image.
popular.content: people like in Paintee is searched.

my.notloginexplain: Please log-in to check followers' and my images.

my.cancelStatusPurchase: Please wait, the postcard is in preparation. If you want to cancel your purchase, please click 'Cancel' button.
my.refundStatusPurchase: Your refund requirement has been submitted. Please wait.
my.sendStatusPurchase: Your postcard is being sent. If you received the postcard, 'confirm' please.
my.deleteStatusPurchase: Are you sure want to delete this image?

rewardPop.content1:
You can collect rewards every time you post your artworks.
Until now,
rewardPop.content2: times posting. Your total Rewards is
rewardPop.content4: If you apply for Rewards now, you can payback
rewardPop.content6: You can apply for rewards only if you have more than $10 USD of rewards.

rewardPop2.content1: 아래 계좌로 지금 받을 수 있는 (영)
rewardPop2.content5: Please enter your account name and account number correctly.
rewardPop2.content6: If incorrect, there will be an error to transfer into your account.

purchasePop1.contents:
Now is the beta test period. We will begin service shortly.


Send 3 free postcards till beta test period over.
Only $2 USD, you can have any images since commercial service.

Please click ‘Payment’ button to continue.
purchasePop1.alert:
Now is the beta test period. We will begin service shortly.


Only $2 USD, you can have any images since commercial service.

Please, wait commercial service.

purchasePop2.contents:
The postcard will be sent soon.
But, please wait, it will take a while.
All purchased postcards will be delivered through regular mail. We won't be able to guarantee specific delivery date.


Please share with your friends.

uploadPop.successContent:
Image has been uploaded successfully.
Please share us your thoughts and feelings regarding this image.
uploadPop.failContent:
Upload Failed!
Larger size is required for high quality printing.
W: 1080px H: 1500px
